items.description: Juan Gabriel en el Palacio de Bellas Artes es el primer álbum en vivo del cantante y compositor mexicano Juan Gabriel, grabado Palacio de Bellas Artes de México del 9 al 12 de mayo de 1990, y publicado el 20 de diciembre del mismo año, por BMG Ariola.​ Todas las canciones escritas y compuestas por Juan Gabriel. N.º Título Duración 1. «Obertura: No discutamos / Mi fracaso / Adiós, amor / Te vas» 4:26 2. «Yo te perdono» 4:10 3. «Yo no nací para amar» 6:18 4. «Popurrí No tengo dinero / Me he quedado solo / No se ha dado cuenta / Buenos días señor Sol» 9:30 5. «Amor del alma» 3:36 6. «Ya lo sé que tú te vas» 8:50 7. «Se me olvidó otra vez» 3:40 8. «Me nace del corazón / La muerte del palomo» 7:12 9. «No vale la pena» 2:32 10. «Que te falta, mujer/ No te vaya a suceder/ Caray» 8:04 11. «Inocente pobre amigo / Te lo pido por favor» 8:40 12. «Amor eterno» 7:08 13. «Hasta que te conocí / La negra Tomasa / Danzando lambada / Caballo viejo / Bamboleo / Hasta que te conocí / Adoro / Te dedico esta canción (Mi canción)» 25:55 14. «Ya no me vuelvo a enamorar / Quédate conmigo esta noche/ Tenías qué ser tan cruel» 13:28 15. «De mí enamórate» 5:22 16. «Mi más bello error» 5:07 17. «Querida/ Contigo aprendí / Bonita / La diferencia / Qué te pasa/ Toda la vida/ Muévanse todos» 14:46 18. «Debo hacerlo» 11:40 19. «La más querida» 7:48 20. «Ya lo pasado, pasado» 2:39 21. «Viva México / Guadalajara» 6:50 22. «Final: Adiós, amor, Te vas» 4:14
items.title: Juan Gabriel en El Palacio de Bellas Artes - 1990

description: F.E. Peters has taken the basic texts of the three related--and competitive--religious systems we call Judaism, Christianity, and Islam and has juxtaposed them in a topical and parallel arrangement according to the issues that most concerned all these "children of Abraham." Through these extensive passages, and the author's connective commentary, the three traditions are shown with their similarities sometimes startlingly underlined and their well-known differences now more profoundly exposed. What emerges from this ambitious work is a panorama of belief, practice, and sensibility that will broaden our understanding of our religious and political roots in a past that is, by these communities' definition, still the present. Throughout the work we hear an amazing variety of voices, some familiar, some not, all of them central to the primary and secondary canons of their own tradition: alongside the Scriptural voice of God are the words of theologians, priests, visionaries, lawyers, rulers and the ruled. -- From publisher description
"Also published simultaneously in 3 separate volumes"--Title page verso
From covenant to community -- The word and the law and the people of God -- The works of the spirit
items.title: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam : the classical texts and their interpretation

subject: beechwood
decomposition processes
leaf litter
Lumbricidae
population dynamics
items.description: In a submontane beechwood on limestone the development of earthworm populations following manipulations of canopy leaf litter input was studied for 5 years. Repeated exclosure of autumnal litterfall (L0) caused a decline in most species. Additional litter of four times the natural rate at the beginning and in the first year of the experiment (L5) resulted in an overall decline, too, but epigeic species showed an increase for an intermediate time interval. In the 5th year the annual average abundance of all earthworms had decreased to 40% of controls for L0 and 70% of controls of L5, respectively
items.title: The development of earthworm populations following manipulation of the canopy leaf litter in a beechwood on limestone

subject: Jungian psychology
Psychoanalytic Therapy
PSYCHOLOGY -- Movements -- Psychoanalysis
Jungiansk psykologi
description: "This book contains an exposition of therapeutic methods used by analytical psychologists. It is based on Jung's own investigations and includes developments in his ideas and practices that others have initiated. Jung held that his work was scientific in that he had discovered an objective field of enquiry. When applying this assertion to analytical psychotherapy one must make it quite clear that, unlike what happens in other sciences, the personality of the therapist enters into the procedures adopted in a way uncharacteristic of experimental method. In the natural sciences study is different in kind and the investigator's personality is significant only in his capacity to be a scientist. By contrast, in analytical therapy the personal influence of the analyst pervades his work and furthermore extends to generations of psychotherapists; the way I conduct psychotherapy is inevitably influenced by my having known Jung, having developed a personal loyalty to him and by being treated by three therapists who came under his influence. This maintains however differently from Jung and my own therapists I conduct myself when treating patients, or whatever conceptions, models or theories of my own I have developed.'It is with these reflections in mind that I have called this volume Jungian Psychotherapy with the subtitle: A Study in Analytical Psychology. Thus my debt to Jung is acknowledged but it is also indicated that analytical psychology is a discipline in its own right."--Michael Fordham, from the Preface

COVER; Contents; Preface; PART I; Chapter 1. The model; Chapter 2. The development of Jung's thesis; Chapter 3. Dreams; Chapter 4. Amplification and active imagination; Chapter 5. Jung's conception of psychotherapy; PART II; Chapter 6. Analysis; Chapter 7. The setting of analysis; Chapter 8. Starting analysis; Chapter 9. Transference and counter-transference; Chapter 10. Resistance and counter-resistance; Chapter 11. Some less-organized behaviour of therapists; Chapter 12. Interpretation; Chapter 13. The analysis of childhood and its limits; Chapter 14. The origins of active imagination
Chapter 15. Terminating analysisChapter 16. Training; Chapter 17. Some applications of therapeutic method; References and bibliography; Index
items.title: Jungian Psychotherapy : a Study in Analytical Psychology

Justice
description: "This book challenges the prevailing philosophical reduction of social justice to distributive justice. It critically analyzes basic concepts underlying most theories of justice, including impartiality, formal equality, and the unitary moral subjectivity. Starting from claims of excluded groups about decision making, cultural expression, and division of labor, Iris Young defines concepts of domination and oppression to cover issues eluding the distributive model. Democratic theorists, according to Young do not adequately address the problem of an inclusive participatory framework. By assuming a homogeneous public, they fail to consider institutional arrangements for including people not culturally identified with white European male norms of reason and respectability. Young urges that normative theory and public policy should undermine group-based oppression by affirming rather than suppressing social group difference. Basing her vision of the good society on the differentiated, culturally plural network of contemporary urban life, she argues for a principle of group representation in democratic publics and for group-differentiated policies"--Back cover

Displacing the distributive paradigm --- Five faces of oppression --- Insurgency and the welfare capitalist society --- The idea of impartiality and the civic public --- The scaling of bodies and the politics of identity --- Social movements and the politics of difference --- Affirmative action and the myth of merit --- City life and difference ---- Epilogue: International justice
items.title: Justice and the politics of difference

items.subject: Hörspiel
items.description: CATEGORY: audio drama TITLE: Kaaba und Llloyd schläft nicht AUTHOR: Franziska Kusch DIRECTOR: Hans Helge Ott PRODUCTION: Radio Bremen YEAR: 1990 RECORDING DATE: 1990-12-11 (Radio Bremen) DESCRIPTION: Kaaba "Haben Sie schon mal einen Igel überfahren?" "Ich nicht. Mein Mann. Ein Reh. Übrigens sehr lecker. Haben wir in Kaufbeuren gegessen. Aber das Wetter war saumäßig. Mit Semmelknödeln und Preiselbeeren. Müssen Sie mal probieren!" Kommunikation an einem Tag wie jeder andere. Ganz normal. Fast. Loyd schläft nicht Loyd schläft nicht. Loyd ist tot. Mama reagiert amüsiert. Chantal, seine Geliebte, trägt's mit Fassung. Rolf findet es irgendwie peinlich, daß Loyd so nackt im Sessel hängt und man seine häßlichen Füße sehen kann. Einzig Esther, Loyds Witwe, wirkt betroffen: Sie muß den ganzen Dreck wegmachen. Schließlich ist sie es ja, die ihn umgebracht hat. CAST: Erika Skrotzki | Friedhelm Ptok | Ulla Evrahr | Ferdinand Dux | Harald Halgardt | u.a. PROVENANCE: digitized cassette tape, private archive of Winfried Noack FORMAT: WAV 44.1 KHz 16 Bit PCM, stereo LANGUAGE: German
items.title: Kaaba und Loyd schläft nicht – Franziska Kusch (1990)

description: En vakker vårmorgen står gubben Pettersen i kjøkkenhagen og kikker og kjenner på jorden. "Nå er tiden inne," sier han til katten Findus som løper omkring og skremmer biller, "i dag skal vi så grønnsaker og sette poteter". Men katten Findus har en annen mening om hva kjøkkenhagen skal brukes til. Og både hønene og kuene vil ha et ord med i laget! I kjent og kjær stil underbygges fortellingen av de friske, detaljrike illustrasjonene. Billedbok for førskolebarn/mellomtrinnet

subject: The Pines
Oka Crisis
CKUT
News Report
Indigenous History
Montreal
items.description: In July 1990 Mohawk Warriors and their supporters began an blockade to stop a group of developers from expanding a golf course onto a piece of land referred to as “The Pines”, a sacred burial ground in Kanehsatà:ke. The resistance expanded to  Akwesasne and Kahnawake  and then across the country, which lasted throughout the summer. The confrontation with Canada's Armed Forces and Sûrté du Québec were at times violent.  CKUT programmers were embedded behind the barricades and provided regular reports. This piece is a montage of reports made from behind the barricades by Lisa Vinebaum.
items.title: Kanastatake Lisa Vinebaum 1990

description: Translation of: Kant und das Problem der Metaphysik

Translator's introduction -- References to works of Kant and Heidegger -- Preface to the fourth edition -- Prefaces to the first, second, and third editions -- Introduction the theme and structure of the investigation -- Part 1: The starting point for the laying of the ground for metaphysics -- Part 2: Carrying out the laying of the ground for metaphysics. A. The characterization of the dimension of going-back [needed] for carrying out the laying of the ground for metaphysics ; B. The stages of carrying out the projection of the inner possibility of ontology -- Part 3: The laying of the ground for metaphysics in its originality. A. The explicit characterization of the ground laid in the ground-laying ; B. The transcendental power of imagination as root of both stems ; C. The transcendental power of imagination and the problem of human pure reason -- Part 4: The laying of the ground for metaphysics in a retrieval. A. The laying of the ground for metaphysics in anthropology ; B. The problem of finitude in human beings and the metaphysics of Dasein ; C. items.subject: Philosophy
items.description: Immanuel Kant published the Critique of the Power of Judgment in 1790, following the Critique of Pure Reason (first published in 1781 and sub- stantially revised in 1787) and the Critique of Practical Reason (published just two years before, in 1788). Early in the decade of labor that preceded the publication of the first Critique, Kant had written to his student Marcus Herz that he was planning a work to be entitled The Limits of Sensibility and Reason, which would consist of two parts: first, “general phenomenol- ogy” and the “nature and method’ of “metaphysics”; and second, “( 1) the universal principles of feeling, taste, and sensuous desire and (2) the first principles of morality.”’ So as early as 1772-and we know this date from Kant’s lectures on anthropology, which commenced the following year2- Kant regarded the theory of taste as a central issue for philosophy. It was a theory that would be one of the two central topics of the Critique ofthe Power of Judgment two decades later. But when he published the Critique  of Pure Reason, nine years after the letter to Herz,
items.title: Kant's Critique Of The Power Of Judgment Critical Essays

items.description: The music on this tape is only half of the 'complete' (although this word is always inappropriate) result. To get the 'complete' tape you should also purchase it's counter, which is released by Industrial Therapy Unit. Play both tapes simultaneously, adjust volume were necessary. All sounds within this project are free to be used by anyone else in any other work. Please give credit to Kapotte Muziek and let us know where you did use it. We have used sounds by the following people: blackhumour, Due Process, Emil Beaulieu, Ios Smolders, John Hudak, Merzbow, New Carrollton, Not Half, SBOTHI, Yeast Culture. Kapotte Produkt OBE This tape is released an edition of 100 copies. Includes an insert with track titles cut in half diagonally. The other half is included in itu 20. items.description: Bu kitaptaki yazılar iki kaynaktan derlendi: David Fernbach'ın hazırladığı Marx, The First International and After, Penguin Books, 1974 ve Marx Engels, Selected Works Volume II, Progress Publishers, 1969. I, II, IV, V, VII, IX, XI, XII, XVI ve XVIII. bölümler The First Interational and After'dan; III, VI, VIII, X, XIII, XV ve XVII. bölümler Selected Works'ten alıdı. "Enterasyonal İşçi Birliği Genel Konseyi'nden Cenevre'deki Rusya Şubesi Komitesi Üyelerine" Rusçadan; "Genel Konseyden Fransız İsviçresi Federal Konseyi'ne", "İşçi Sınıfının Politik Eylemi Üzerine", "Entemasyonalde Olduğu İddia Edilen Bölünmeler" ve "Lahey Genel Kongresi'nde Alınan Kararlardan" Fransızca'dan; “Lahey Kongresi Üzerine Konuşma" Almanca'dan İngilizceye yapılan çevirilerinden, öteki bölümlerin hepsi İngilizce asıllarından Türkçeye çevrilmiştir. Dipnotlar, David Fernbach'ın ve Selected Work'un dipnotları birleştirilerek hazırlanmıştır. · "Örgütlenme Meselesinin" ilk basımı Eki 1975'te SER YAYINEVİ tarafından yapılmıştır.
items.title: Karl Marx, Friedrich Engels - Birinci Enternasyonalde Örgütlenme Meselesi (Ekim Yayınları)

items.description: Marx/Engels, On Literature and Art (Edebiyat ve Sanat Üstüne), Progress Publishers, Moskova, 1976; Lenin, O Literature and Art (Edebiyat ve Sanat Üstüne), Progress Publishers, Moskova, 1975, üçüncü basım. (Bu kitabın hazırlanışında, ayrıca, Marx ve Engels bölümü için, Almanca özgün dilinden karşılaştırması yapılmıştır: Marx/Engels, Über Kunst und Literatur/Sanat ve Edebiyat Üstüne, Europdische Verlag, Frankfurt am Main, yay. Manfed Kleim).   Aziz Çalışlar "Marx-Engels-Lenin: Sanat ve Edebiyat" adlı bu kitap, aslında ayrı ayrı kitaplardan derlenmiş, Marx, Engels ve Lenin'in sanat ve edebiyata ilişkin yazılarından bu kitapların düzenine uygun olarak yapılan seçmeleri biraraya getirmektedir. Bundan amaç, Marksist-Leninist sanat anlayışının temelini oluşturan bu yazıları bir bütün olarak verebilmektir. Bilindiği gibi, bilimsel maddeciliğin klasikleri, sanat üstüne başlı başına bir kitap bırakma m ış oldukları gibi; kendi içinde kapalı, sistematik bir sanat kuramını geliştirmek için de enine boyuna uğraşacak ne zaman bulabilişler, ne de aslında, bu çalışmalar içinde boğularak, eylemin dışında kalmak istemişlerdir. Böylesine sistematik-kuramsal bir kitabın olmayışı, burjuva araştırmacıları, Marksizmin kurucularının sanat konusunda bilimsel ve felsefi görüşleri olmadığı sonucuna götürdüğü kadar; Marksizme bağlı düşünürleri de, Marx ve Engels'in özgün bir sanat düşüncesi geliştirememiş olduğu sonucuna götürmüştür. Oysa Marksizmin kurucuları, gerek felsefi, ekonomi-politik ve tarihsel konuları içeren yapıtlarında, gerek çok çeşitli yazışmalarında sanatsal sorunları derinden ele almışlardı. Ancak, bütün bu ayrı ayrı yapıtlarda yer alan sanatla ilgili bölümlerin derlenip, mantıksal bir biçimde, yeni baştan toplu olarak düzenlenmesi gerekiyordu.
items.title: Karl Marx, Friedrich Engels, V. İ. Lenin - Sanat Ve Edebiyat (Ekim Yayınları)

items.description: TÜRKÇE ÇEVİRENİN NOTU Okur, bu kitabın biçimiyle ilgili kimi bilgileri Prof. S.A. Yanovskaya'nın yazdığı önsözün sonunda bulacaktır. Onlara şunla eklemekte yarar var: Ayraç içindeki İngilizce sözcükler, terimler, vb. eksik veya yanlış anlamaları önlemek için çevirence alıkonmuştur. Türkçeye çevirenin herhangi bir notunun, eklemesinin, vb. sonuna "-ç." konmuştur. "-Trans." İngilizceye çeviren, "-Ed." İngilizce yayımlayan ile ilgili noıan, yorumları, vb. gösterir. Çeviride, elden geldiğince, alışılmış Türkçe matematik terimleri kullanıldı. Yalnız, eldeki matematik terimleri sözlüklerinde Türkçe karşılığı bulunmayan veya bulunup da yadırganan birkaç terime karşılık bulmak gerekti: incremenı-atım, decremen-eksilim, diiferentiation-faklılaştırma, derivation-türetim gibi... Bu not vesilesiyle, elinizdeki çeviriyi, onu gözden geçiren kızım Yosum'a armağan ettğimi söylemek isterim.
items.title: Karl Marx - Matematiksel El Yazmaları (Başak Yayınları)

subject: ಕನ್ನಡ ಸಾಹಿತ್ಯ
ಮಾಸಿಕ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆ
ಕಸ್ತೂರಿ ಸಂಚಯ
Kasturi Magazine
items.description: ಕಸ್ತೂರಿಯ ಪ್ರಕಾಶಕರಾದ ಲೋಕ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣ ಟ್ರಸ್ಟ್ - ಹುಬ್ಬಳ್ಳಿ, ಈ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ಡಿಜಿಟೈಸ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಶ್ರೀಮತಿ ಛಾಯಾ ಕೆ. ಉಪಾಧ್ಯಾ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಅನುಮತಿಸಿರುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಸಂಚಿ ಫೌಂಡೇಶನ್ (https://sanchifoundation.org) ಹಾಗೂ ಸಂಚಯದ (https://sanchaya.org) ವತಿಯಿಂದ ಇಂಡಿಯನ್ ಅಕಾಡೆಮಿ ಆಫ್ ಸೈನ್ಸ್ಸ್, ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಜ್ಞಾನದ ಸೇವಕರು (Servants Of Knowledge) ಸಮುದಾಯ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತ್ವದ ಕೆಲಸದಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ, ಈ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ಡಿಜಿಟಲೀಕರಿಸಲಾಗಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ಲೋಕ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣ ಟ್ರಸ್ಟ್ - ಹುಬ್ಬಳ್ಳಿ, ಪಬ್ಲಿಕ್ ರಿಸೋರ್ಸ್. ಓಆರ್ ಜಿ, ಐ.ಎ.ಎಸ್.ಸಿ, ಸಂಚಯ ಹಾಗೂ ಸಂಚಿ ಫೌಂಡೇಷನ್ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳನ್ನು, ಶ್ರೀಮತಿ ಛಾಯಾ ಕೆ. ಉಪಾಧ್ಯಾ ಅವರನ್ನೂ ಈ ಕಾರ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನೆರವಾಗಿದ್ದಕ್ಕೆ ಈ ಮೂಲಕ ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳನ್ನು ಅರ್ಪಿಸುತ್ತಿದ್ದೇವೆ.
items.title: ಕಸ್ತೂರಿ ನವೆಂಬರ್ 1990

items.description: ಕಸ್ತೂರಿಯ ಪ್ರಕಾಶಕರಾದ ಲೋಕ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣ ಟ್ರಸ್ಟ್ - ಹುಬ್ಬಳ್ಳಿ, ಈ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ಡಿಜಿಟೈಸ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಶ್ರೀಮತಿ ಛಾಯಾ ಕೆ. ಉಪಾಧ್ಯಾ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಅನುಮತಿಸಿರುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಸಂಚಿ ಫೌಂಡೇಶನ್ (https://sanchifoundation.org) ಹಾಗೂ ಸಂಚಯದ (https://sanchaya.org) ವತಿಯಿಂದ ಇಂಡಿಯನ್ ಅಕಾಡೆಮಿ ಆಫ್ ಸೈನ್ಸ್ಸ್, ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಜ್ಞಾನದ ಸೇವಕರು (Servants Of Knowledge) ಸಮುದಾಯ ಸಹಭಾಗಿತ್ವದ ಕೆಲಸದಡಿಯಲ್ಲಿ, ಈ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ಡಿಜಿಟಲೀಕರಿಸಲಾಗಿರುತ್ತದೆ. ಲೋಕ ಶಿಕ್ಷಣ ಟ್ರಸ್ಟ್ - ಹುಬ್ಬಳ್ಳಿ, ಪಬ್ಲಿಕ್ ರಿಸೋರ್ಸ್. ಓಆರ್ ಜಿ, ಐ.ಎ.ಎಸ್.ಸಿ, ಸಂಚಯ ಹಾಗೂ ಸಂಚಿ ಫೌಂಡೇಷನ್ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಗಳನ್ನು, ಶ್ರೀಮತಿ ಛಾಯಾ ಕೆ. ಉಪಾಧ್ಯಾ ಅವರನ್ನೂ ಈ ಕಾರ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನೆರವಾಗಿದ್ದಕ್ಕೆ ಈ ಮೂಲಕ ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳನ್ನು ಅರ್ಪಿಸುತ್ತಿದ್ದೇವೆ.
items.title: ಕಸ್ತೂರಿ ಸೆಪ್ಟೆಂಬರ್ 1990

subject: Chopin, Kate, 1850-1904
Chopin, Kate, 1851-1904
Chopin, Kate
Authors, American
Women and literature
Écrivains américains
Biographie
description: Kate Chopin was thirty-four years old and the widow of a near-bankrupt cotton factor from an old southern family when she returned to her native St. louis with her six children. Her first books and stories gained her national celebrity as an outstanding local-color writer, but all tht chaned in 1899 with the publicaiton of "The Awakening". Its sympathetic portrayal of a young woman's adulterous love affair and the unprecedented candor of its heroine's erotic longings shocked hte popular taste of the day - and its author, condemed and ostracized, died soon after. In the 1960's, as the women's movemetn was taking shape, a new generation discovered "The Awakening" and made Kate Chopin its standard-bearer. Her story, fully told for the first a fascinating and ocmplex woman who not only lived by her own rules, but whose lide was the basis for the legendary fiction she created. The conven-school-eduacted daughter of a prosperous Missouri family with Confederate sympathies, she married at twenty and eventually settled, with her husband, Oscar, among his people in Louisiana's Cane River country. There Kate Chopin's unconventional temperament and personal flamboyance asserted themselves, stirring up gossip and debate among the locasl, but it was also in the sensual atmosphere of Louisiana, with its warm, dark nights, that the young wife, who had married early and possible withough passions, discovered her own deep desires. Oscar Chopin's untimley death from malaria in 1882 - a crisis described in a gripping dtail - brought the family's deteriorating financial circumstances to a hear; but it also vecame the even that would direct the rest of Kate Chopin's life and writing. Rejecting the future that might have been expected of her as the pious guardian of her husband's memory, she would later embark on a scandalous affair with a married man, a realationship revealed here for the first time and one that ultimatley propelled her ourt of the conventiaonal life and into the world of the avant-garde writer who finally went too far. On her return to St. Louis, Kate Chopin transformed the passion of her Louisiaa days into the sensual rhthms of prose and into realistic stories about other passionate, discontented women who wanted to break free. Endowed with vigorous energy and determination, she wrote over one hundred short stories, novels, plays, reviews, essays, and poems in her fourteen years as a writer - a formidable literary output that mde her one of the most prolific writers of her era. For such a major figure, a major biography was needed. Seven years in the writing, "Kate Chopin" is a work of immense scholarship. Emily Toth's extensive knowledge of the geographical, literary, and social worlds in which Kate Chopin moved brings exceptional woman vivid life. Cutting through the sea of inaccuracy and speculation that has formed Chopin's legacy, Emily Toth not only reveals the truth behind the alleged banning of "The Awakening", but also offers an enthralling portrait of a woman with twentieth-century ideas living in a nineteenth-century world, allowing us to understand why and how Kate Chopin became heroine and pioneer to readers who treasure her writings fervently

items.subject: Literature--Experimental--United States
items.description: Description:  Larry McCaffery interviews Kathy Acker in her Greenwich Village apartment. The interview begins with a discussion of why Acker had recently moved back to the United States from England. Acker discusses her use of “I” in text and what it means in relation to her own identity. Acker discusses her use of appropriation in her fiction. Acker explains her view of the “shock” aspects of her work and whether she qualifies as “avant-garde.” Acker talks about her interest in myth rather than story. The interview goes in-depth on Acker’s most recent novels, In Memoriam to Identity and Empire of the Senseless. The final 68 minutes of the interview are a follow-up phone call in which McCaffery and Acker go over a typed transcript of the interview. McCaffery asks several questions regarding clarifications. There is considerable discussion of the threat of a lawsuit regarding Harold Robbins. There is a discussion of commerciality in Acker’s novel Blood and Guts in High School which was not in the original interview but is in the published version of the interview. Separate edited versions of the interview appear in Mississippi Review, Vol. 20, No. 1 / 2, pp. 83-97 and on pages 14 to 35 of Some Other Frequency: Interviews with Innovative American Authors, ed. Larry McCaffery, University of Pennsylvania Press, 1996. Collection: Larry McCaffery Papers Rights:  Copyrighted. Rights are owned by Larry McCaffery and the heirs or estates of Kathy Acker. Copyright holders have given San Diego State University, Special Collections and University Archives permission to provide access to the digitized work online. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. In addition, the reproduction of some materials may be restricted by terms of gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.  Acknowledgement:  This project was supported by a Recordings at Risk grant from the Council on Library and Information Resources (CLIR). The grant program is made possible by funding from The Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

items.description: A personal VHS copy of a cutting room floor edit tape from KCRA-TV Channel 3 Sacramento. This tape was given to one of the editing room engineers in SNG (Satellite News Gathering) efforts. Original equipment used consisted of Pansonic MII broadcast quality videotape machines and Sony BVE-900 edit controllers. Because this is a copy of an intermediate edit tape it contains both complete story segments and unused b-roll footage, with and without audio. This was software decoded using the vhs-decode Python tools for Linux with a modified Sony SLV-788HF VCR. The cxadc Linux driver was used to capture the raw RF signal directly from the tape heads. This results in full preservation of the raw RF video signal as an audio file which can be decoded in software multiple times with improvements and adjustments to video RF filters, de-emphasis, sharpness, etc. The video RF signal is saved as a 16MSPS 8-bit per sample FLAC compressed audio file. The end result was deinterlaced using the QTGMC AviSynth+ script and frame rate doubled. The interlaced video version is also here for viewing on CRT televisions. Note that this particular tape was not recorded to exact VHS spec and its video carrier frequency is slightly higher than expected. To compensate for this, you must specify a 15.5MSPS sample rate when decoding with vhs-decode. The sound was recorded traditionally using the audio RCA jacks on the VCR. This result is the best that can be achieved compared to traditional "hardware decoded" playback using standard composite video capture cards, dongles, and other consumer capture devices. The software decoding method bypasses a portion of analog circuitry in a typical VCR used to demodulate and decode the raw RF tape signal to composite video or s-video. The end result is a cleaner and sharper picture because of less analog noise and distortion, and more video bandwidth is preserved and captured. More information on the vhs-decode software: https://github.com/oyvindln/vhs-decode
items.title: KCRA-TV VHS Edit Tape RF Capture

items.description: I time-stamp everything. I recorded this on my computer on August 8, 1990 at 12:06am. How do I know that? I embedded that information in the sound file itself [also the file date is 08/08/1990, appropriately KENUDUT.SND ] Yes, Steppenwolf was my CB Handle and one of my first online names. Why? Everybody was a wolf and all the good ones were taken. This is Kenneth Udut at age 18, just after high school and before college. I was beta testing Neverwinter Nights at the time, first MMORPG on PC-Link, which later became known as America Online. I'm using DOSBox here. The software is Tandy Deskmate and the sound file is an 8-bit mono uncompressed.
items.title: KENUDUT.SND - Kenneth Udut August 8, 1990 at 12:06am Age 18 [Time-stamps Everything]

items.description: Taken from an encore presentation of the pilot episode of "The Flash" on CBS affiliate KENS, channel 5, in San Antonio. Record date: Saturday, October 13, 1990 0:00 - Channel intro 0:05 - padding/buffer 0:10 - "The Flash" Pringles sponsor bump 0:27 - Vicks Nyquil (sounds like Casey Kasem voiceover at the end but not entirely sure) 0:57 - Wendy's New Grilled Chicken Fillet Sandwich 1:28 - Head & Shoulders Intensive Treatment Dandruff Shampoo 1:59 - Ultra Slim Fast (with Dan Dierdorf) 2:29 - CBS "Murder x7" promo 2:49 - CBS "Top Cops" promo 2:59 - CBS "Over My Dead Body" promo (with KENS legal ID insert) 3:04 - "The Flash" bumper 3:12 - padding/buffer 3:22 - GM Offer of Quality 3:52 - Plax 4:09 - Visa 4:39 - Degree Antiperspirant 4:54 - Glade Carpet Potpourri 5:24 - "The Flash" bumper 5:29 - CBS "60 Minutes" promo 5:40 - CBS Sunday Morning promo (with Charles Kuralt) 5:49 - CBS "Major Dad" promo 5:59 - CBS "Doctor Doctor" promo 6:09 - CBS network ID 6:12 - Paragon's Weekend Instant Installation Marathon * Paragon Cable, a Minneapolis-based concern, at the time held the cable franchise for San Antonio, having acquired it a year earlier from Canadian company Rogers Cablevision, who was exiting the US to focus on its core Canadian assets. Paragon also served other major markets such as Minneapolis, Portland (OR), Birmingham and the Dallas-Fort Worth market. Paragon was bought out by Time Warner Cable in 1999, but did not transition fully to that brand until late 2000 (I remember for a while they were branded as "Paragon, A Time Warner Company"). Most other Paragon markets are actually now served by Comcast after some swaps, but San Antonio was not affected. TWC was bought out by Charter Communications in 2016, and currently uses the brand "Spectrum" in all their markets, and that's who holds the cable franchise now. 6:42 - Pizza Hut 7:12 - KENS 10pm weather tease/legal ID (with Jim Thomas and music from CBS' 1988-89 image campaign "Television You Can Feel") 7:18 - الأزهر
محمد
جلال
كشك
items.description: ودخلت الخيل الأزهر هذا الكتاب الخلاف حول تفسير التاريخ ليس ظاهرة ترف، ولا هو مجرد خلاف حول تفسير الماضي، بل هو في الدرجة الأولى خلاف حول الطريق إلى المستقبل. ومنذ الغزو الفرنسي لمصر ظهرت مدرستان: المدرسة الاستعمارية التي تمثلها كتابات د. لويس عوض التي تنادي بالتغريب وتعتبر أنّ المتعاونين مع الاستعمار هم رواد التقدم وطليعته، ومن نماذجها المعلم يعقوب والذين داروا مع جنود الاحتلال. وفي مواجهة هذه المدرسة قامت المدرسة الوطنية لتفسير التاريخ التي ترى الوطنية والتقدم والحداثة من منظور واحد هو مقاومة التبعية لأوروبا؛ مقاومة الاحتلال الغربي للشرق الإسلامي، وتمثلها كتابات الأستاذ محمد جلال كشك. الذي أصدر كتابه هذا في أعقاب هزيمة 1967 عندما نشطت المدرسة الاستعمارية للترويج للدور التحضيري والتحريري الذي لعبه غزو البلدان المتقدمة للشرق المتخلّف، وكانوا في الحقيقة يدعون الأمة العربية لقبول التحضير الإسرائيلي! وكان صدور الكتاب -وقتها- محاولة لكشف هذا التزييف، وإعادة ثقة الأمة بمستقبلها، من خلال وعيها بماضيها. واليوم إذ يعود ورثة المعلم يعقوب، ودعاة المدرسة الاستعمارية، فيسيطرون على وسائل الإعلام، وينتهزون مناسبة الاحتفالات بالثورة الفرنسية للترويج من جديد لمفاهيمهم، فيخلطون عن عمد بين إنجازات الثورة في فرنسا وجرائم الاحتلال في بلادنا، تأتي هذه الطبعة الجديدة المزيدة من الكتاب الذي كان علامة فاصلة في دراسة وتفسير تاريخ الحملة الفرنسية بل وعلاقة الشرق بالغرب. الناشر
items.title: ودخلت الخيل الأزهر

subject: india
north india
muslims
indian muslims
socialism
items.description: The reconciliation of basic Islamic principles with modernity has been a major challenge for Muslims over the last two centuries. This study uncovers the responses of Indian Muslims who were drawn to socialist ideas between the Bolshevik Revolution and Partition. From the Pan-Islamist muhajirin, who migrated to Soviet Central Asia during the Khilafat agitation of 1919-24, to the upper-class literary radicals of the Progressive Writers Movement of the 1930s and 1940s, socialism provided Muslim radicals with an intellectual toolkit for analysing their own society and constructing strategies for emancipation from Western oppression. In fact, the principles of liberty, equality, and fraternity that existed within Islamic ideology encouraged Muslim socialists to embrace a secular mode of thinking. Recognizing these familiar strands in socialist theory legitimatized their fascination with socialism. This book sheds light on the fact that religious and political separatism were not the only paths adopted by the Muslims of north India to move forward under colonial rule.
items.title: The Emergence Of Socialist Thought Among North Indian Muslims

В третьем томе помещены важные работы в области применения кибернетических идей к управлению в экономике, развитию средств вычислительной техники, а также использованию кибернетических систем в различных областях народного хозяйства. Для специалистов в области кибернетики, вычислительной техники, прикладной математики, преподавателей, аспирантов и студентов вузов. items.description: Runaway is a 10cc single . It comes from their album Ten out of 10 . The single was only released in England. It is one of the songs written by Andrew Gold , Eric Stewart and Graham Gouldman in the period that it looked like Gold became the producer of the album. That did not end and Runaway disappeared on the shelf, but appeared on the American version of the album. Runaway is used as Runaway (runaways) and Run Away (run away). The background choir is similar to the choir from I'm Not in Love . B-side was Action Man in Motown Suit , which featured both the European and American pressing of the album. Personnel: Eric Stewart: Lead Vocal, Guitar, Synthesizer, Backing Vocal Graham Gouldman: Bass, Backing Vocal, Guitar Andrew Gold: Backing Vocal, Electric Piano, Synthesizer, Percussion Michael Boddicker, James Newton Howard & Suzanne Ciani: Synclavier
items.title: Kids At The Senior Prom On Dance Party USA Slow Dance To 10cc's Run Away

description: Against the background of Denmark's evolution from a mercantile economy to a broad-based agricultural economy, Kirmmse reinterprets Kierkegaard's thought as a reaction to the tensions within his society

Part One: Kierkegaard's Denmark -- Section I: Political, economic, and social trends -- Historical background and the rise of peasantry to 1820 -- Religious currents until 1820 -- The peasant awakenings of the 1820's and after -- The rise of liberalism in the 1830's -- The peasant movement to the late 1840's -- The national question in Southern Jutland -- 1848 and after -- Section II: Politics and religion in "golden age" culture -- The social orientation and intellectual origins of the golden age -- "The rare few": Adam Oehlenschlager and the first generation of the golden age -- Piety and good taste: J.P. Mynster's religion and politics -- Johan Ludvig Heiberg -- H.L. Martensen -- N.F.S. Grundtvig and history's flock: National popular culture in the service of religion -- H.N. Clausen and Orla Lehmann: The liberal alternative to the golden age mainstream -- The golden age and its alternatives -- Part Two: Denmark's Kierkegaard -- Soren Kierkegaard: Life and literary career to February 1846 -- A literary review -- Edifying discourses in various spirits -- Works of love -- The crisis and a crisis in the life of an actress -- Two minor ethico-religious essays -- Christian discourses -- The sickness unto death -- Training in Christianity -- Autobiographical pieces, "two notes" concerning "the individual," and the "open letter" to Dr. Rudelbach -- Two series of discourses "recommended to the present age" -- The attack on Christendom -- Epilogue: The response to the attack on Christendom
items.title: Kierkegaard in golden-age Denmark

items.description: Jazz-Fusion band Kilimanjaro in a rare live concert appearance on 6/01/1990 on Vermont PBS TV's Live! From The Archives. Kilimanjaro released 2 albums on the Philo record label in 1979 & 1982, Kilimanjaro and Kilimanjaro Two . I first heard them on KPEN FM (Bay Area) in the early 80's and bought both albums on vinyl (now out of print-see .png files). Kilimanjaro: Chuck Eller - Keyboards, Paul Asbell - Guitar, Tony Markellis - Bass, Harry Thompson - Drums, Russell Remington - Tenor Sax, Stuart Paton - Percussion. Special Guests: David Grippo - Alto Sax, Kip Meaker - Guitar & Vocals, Big Joe Burrell - Saxophone & Vocals. With Burrell, Kilimanjaro becomes the Unknown Blues Band (his backup band). Kilimanjaro disbanded in the mid-90's but released a reunion album, Homecoming , in 2009. Read a review here: https://www.sevendaysvt.com/vermont/kilimanjaro-homecoming/Content?oid=2136196
items.title: Kilimanjaro Live! 1990 From The Archives PBS

subject: Field Museum of Natural History

Pottery, Prehistoric -- Peru
Peru -- Antiquities
description: This paper describes and illustrates an unusually large collection of Killke and Killke-related pottery vessels from the Field Museum of Natural History, Chicago. As the immediate antecedent to classic Inca pottery, Killke pottery holds a unique and important position in th cultural history of the Cuzco area. An adequate definition of this style is essential for constructing and testing models of early Inca state development. This paper will: 1) provide a summary of previous research on Killke pottery, 2) place the Field Museum collection in historical context, and 3) describe the 17 full-sized Killke and Killke-related vessels, utilizing the typology first suggested by John H. Rowe for early Inca materials from Cuzco

Fieldiana series has been published as Anthropological Series by Field Columbian Museum (1895-1909) and Field Museum of Natural History (1909-1943), and as Fieldiana: Anthropology by Chicago Natural History Museum (1945-1966) and Field Museum of Natural History (1966-)
items.title: Killke and Killke-related pottery from Cuzco, Peru, in the Field Museum of Natural History

items.description: Η ΑΠΕΡΓΙΑ ΤΩΝ ΠΑΙΔΙΩΝ - Kinderstreik in Santa Nicola - Keine Oliven für Don Camale - Feustel Gunther -  Günther Feustel   1972 Εκδοτικός οίκος: Εκδοτική Ομάδα Μετάφραση: Μαυρίδης Κώστας Τόπος έκδοσης: Θεσσαλονίκη 1990 https://www.alfeiosbooks.com/product/η-απεργία-των-παιδιών-στο-σάντα-νίκολα/ Περιγραφή Τα άρβυλα του αφεντικού Γκαμαλε Πώς ο Νίνο Πουτσετίνο δοκίμασε τα άρβυλα της τύχης Ο Πουτσετίνο και το περιστέρι Ο Νίνο αφήνει την τύχη να πετάξει Ο Νίνο Πουτσετίνο και η κατσίκα κοκολα Ο Νίνο Πουτσετίνο και το κατσικίσιο τυρί Jurybegründung In einem italienischen Bergdorf lebt Nino Puccetino mit seiner kleinen Schwester, dem Großvater und einer mageren Ziege. Jeder Tag bringt die Sorge um das tägliche Brot und immer wieder neue Träume vom Glück. Mit allerlei phantastischen Ideen versucht Nino mit der Armut fertig zu werden, die auch die Mutter nach Turin vertrieb. Eines Tages besiegt Puccetino, der Däumling, den gefürchteten „Riesen“ Don Camale. Nicht allein, aber gemeinsam mit allen Kindern von Santa Nicola, die der reiche Gutsbesitzer um ihren geringen Lohn für’s Oliven pflücken betrügen will. Mit sparsamen Worten schildert der Autor realistisch und unsentimental Landschaft und Charaktere. Er fordert Kinder ab 9 Jahren zur Auseinandersetzung mit sozialen Problemen auf, wie sie überall auf der Welt gegenwärtig sind. Moderne Fotomontagen mit starker Aussagekraft regen zum Nachdenken und Diskutieren an https://www.jugendliteratur.org/buch/kinderstreik-in-santa-nicola-3151 J
items.title: Η ΑΠΕΡΓΙΑ ΤΩΝ ΠΑΙΔΙΩΝ - Kinderstreik in Santa Nicola - Günther Feustel - 1972

items.description: King's Quest  is an  adventure game  developed by  Sierra On-Line  and published originally for the  IBM PCjr  in 1984 and later for several other systems between 1984 and 1989. The game was originally titled  King's Quest ; the subtitle  Quest for the Crown  was added to the game box in the 1987 re-release, but did not appear in the game. It is the first official part of the long  King's Quest  series (not counting 1980's  Wizard and the Princess ), in which a young knight, Sir Graham, must save the Kingdom of Daventry to become the king. Designed by  Roberta Williams , the game was revolutionary and highly influential in the evolution of the  graphic adventure game  genre by introducing more detailed graphics and animation. An official remake titled  King's Quest I: Quest for the Crown  was released in 1990. An unofficial remake was released by  Tierra Entertainment  in 2001. In the original version for the  IBM PCjr , the story is simple. The Kingdom of Daventry is suffering from recent disasters and hardship. King Edward calls his bravest knight, Sir Grahame, to his throne, and tells him he has heard of three legendary treasures hidden throughout the land that would end Daventry's troubles. If Grahame succeeds, he will become king. [4]  In later releases, the knight's name was changed to Graham. King's Quest: Quest for the Crown [ edit ] Since the game's fourth release (1984) and the repackaged fifth release (1987), the backstory was greatly expanded. The Kingdom of Daventry is in serious trouble, after its precious magical items have been stolen. One day, King Edward the Benevolent rescued a beautiful young Princess Dahlia of Cumberland, but on the night of their wedding she was discovered to actually be an evil witch who stole the king's treasure. Knowing that he had to save the kingdom, the dying King Edward sends his bravest knight, Sir Graham, to Cumberland. His quest is to rid the land of the treacherous witch, outwit the other assorted villains, and retrieve the three lost treasures. Because he had no heir, if Graham should succeed, he would become the next king. [5] Sir Graham embarked upon a quest for the items through Daventry, climbing a magic  beanstalk  to the Land of the Clouds where he recovered the chest of gold, facing leprechauns to retrieve the shield and a dragon to get back the mirror. After retrieving all the items, Graham returned to the throne room in time to present them to the king before he died. As the king died, he passed on rule of Daventry to Sir Graham as promised.

items.description: Here is King's Quest 5 King's Quest V: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder!  (also known simply as  King's Quest V ) is a 1990  graphic adventure game  by  Sierra On-Line . Originally released in November 1990, it featured a significant improvement in graphics (achieved through the introduction of  VGA  into the series). It was also the first  King's Quest  installment to replace the typing user interface with a point-and-click user interface. The title is a spoof on the proverb "Absence makes the heart grow fonder". King's Quest V  sold over half million copies and won several awards. It was later released as a fully voiced "talkie"  CD-ROM , done by members of the Sierra staff. By summer a  Sega CD  port of the game was announced, but was never released In the introduction to the game, a view of Castle Daventry is shown, when suddenly, a mysterious cloaked figure appears. He enchants the castle, causing a whirlwind to appear, which soon engulfs the castle and lifts it out of sight. Because he is out walking when this happens, King Graham is the only member of the royal family to be left behind. He returns to the castle to find that it has disappeared, and is soon confronted by a talking owl named Cedric. Cedric witnessed the cloaked figure's attack, and tells Graham that it was a powerful, evil wizard named Mordack who stole the castle. Cedric then brings Graham to the land of Serenia, where his master Crispin resides. Crispin is also a wizard, but a good one, who gives Graham some advice, his old wand, and a piece of white snake which allows Graham to speak with animals. Graham then starts on his journey. Later, Graham learns that Mordack is the brother of the wizard Manannan, whom Graham's son, Prince Alexander, turned into a cat in  King's Quest III . Mordack has imprisoned the castle and royal family of Daventry out of revenge, and threatens to feed the royal family to Manannan unless Prince Alexander agrees to restore him to his true form as the spell's nature means that only Prince Alexander as the caster can reverse it. King Graham travels through the land of Serenia, gathering helpful items and information, and eventually makes his way to Mordack's island, and to his castle lair, to save his family from their impending doom. The owl Cedric accompanies the protagonist King Graham through the entire game to provide commentary and advice. He has to be rescued from danger at several points. The only useful thing the owl does is inadvertently saving Graham's life from a spell near the end of the game. At the end of the game, with the help of another of Mordack's prisoners, Princess Cassima, Graham is able to confront Mordack in a magical duel, using spells he learns from Mordack's own spell book against him. After Mordack transforms himself into a ring of fire, Graham slays the evil wizard by conjuring a rain storm to put the fire out. The good wizard Crispin arrives soon after and transforms the castle and the royal family back to normal. At Graham's request, Crispin teleports Cassima back to her home in the Land of the Green Isles and sends the royal family back to Daventry.
items.title: King's Quest 5 Absence Makes The Heart Go Yonder ( CD DOS)

items.subject: Hörspiel
items.description: CATEGORY: audio drama TITLE: Kleine Eheverbrechen AUTHOR: Eric-Emmanuel Schmitt TRANSLATION: Elke Bahr DIRECTOR: Norbert Schaeffer MUSIC: Wolfgang Florey PRODUCTION: Westdeutscher Rundfunk/Norddeutscher Rundfunk YEAR: 2004 RECORDING DATE: 2005-06-08 (Norddeutscher Rundfunk) DESCRIPTION: Als Krimiautor Gilles Sobiri, der bei einem mysteriösen Unfall sein Gedächtnis verloren hat, nach Hause zurückkehrt, kommt ihm alles fremd vor, einschließlich der Frau an seiner Seite. Die heißt Lisa und behauptet, seit fünfzehn Jahren mit ihm verheiratet zu sein. Gilles kann das nicht widerlegen, allerdings lässt er sich auch nicht überzeugen. Fest steht nur, dass er sich stark zu Lisa hingezogen fühlt. Beweis genug für ihn, dass es sich nicht um seine Gattin handelt. Grund genug für Lisa wiederum, den Avancen eines Mannes zu misstrauen, der zu neuen Abenteuern bereit, aber außerstande ist, sich der alten Bindung zu erinnern. Mühsam versuchen die beiden seine Vergangenheit zu rekonstruieren. Beunruhigt und amüsiert zugleich, lauscht er dem allzu perfekten und gleichsam widersprüchlichen Porträt, das sie von ihm und ihrer gemeinsamen Liebe zeichnet. Doch was, wenn Lisa lügt? Was, wenn er selbst nun die Wahrheit verschweigt? CAST: Krimiautor Gilles Sobiri - Christian Redl | Sobiris Frau Lisa - Marion Martienzen PROVENANCE: digitized cassette tape, private archive of Winfried Noack FORMAT: WAV 44.1 KHz 16 Bit PCM, stereo LANGUAGE: German

items.subject: Hörspiel
items.description: CATEGORY: audio drama TITLE: Klavier am Ende der Gänge AUTHOR: Raimund Petschner DIRECTOR: Hans Helge Ott MUSIC: Rudolf Schmücker PRODUCTION: Radio Bremen YEAR: 1990 RECORDING DATE: 1992-03-24 (Radio Bremen) DESCRIPTION: Hals, ein Pianist, ist tot. Dienstag und Donnerstag spielte er nachts im "Perron bleu" - obwohl seine Musik nicht "Barmusik" war, eigentlich. An einem frühen Morgen kommt als letzter Gast ein Mann ins Lokal und erkundigt sich eindringlich nach Hals. Die Barfrau nimmt's gelassen: Ja, wer war Hals eigentlich? Das weiß eigentlich niemand. Ein anonymer Erzähler weiß offenbar mehr, aber er gibt nur preis, was er preisgeben will... Noch ein "Stiller"? Nicht noch ein "Stiller". Ein Gleichnis? Kein Gleichnis. Ein Krimi? Kein Krimi. Ein Exi-Stück? Kein Exi-Stück. Eine Parabel? Keine Parabel. Eine Komödie? Keine Komödie. Ein Hörspiel? Ein Hörspiel. CAST: Hille Darjes | Siegfried Kernen | Bereket Andrebrhan PROVENANCE: digitized cassette tape, private archive of Winfried Noack FORMAT: WAV 44.1 KHz 16 Bit PCM, stereo LANGUAGE: German

subject: diagnostic species
humus form classification
indicator species
multivariate analysis
items.description: Morphologically characterized humus forms and their associated understory vegetation have been used to infer different modes of decomposition of forest floor materials, but few studies have analyzed relationships among humus forms, forest floor nutrient properties, and understory vegetation. Examination of these relationships was accomplished in this study by a numerical analysis of forest floor and vegetation data that were obtained from 151 cool mesothermal forest ecosystems of southern British Columbia and stratified into seven humus form groups. Four forest floor nutrient properties (pH, C/N ratio, total N, and sum of exchangeable Ca, Mg, and K) and nine diagnostic combinations of species differentiated the groups. pH and mineralizable-N consistently increased, and C/N ratio consistently decreased from Lignomors to Hemimors, Humimors, Mormoders, Leptomoders, and to Vermimulls, indicating the presence of a regional decomposition gradient. Multivariate summaries of the nutrient properties and diagnostic species were highly correlated. A consistent correlation was also found between the nutrient properties and indicator plants of nitrogen-rich soils.
items.title: Relationships among humus forms, forest floor nutrient properties, and understory vegetation

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from April 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze aflevering is van april 1990. Weet u meer van dit programma? Laat het ons weten. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages van Derk Bolt. Items in deze aflevering: * Zomerdienstregeling, met onder andere een nieuwe lijndienst naar Baltimore / Washington. * 1:11 . J.G.M. Meijer over nieuwe vluchten, naar Oost-Europa na de val van de muur. Reportage over de vestiging van de KLM in Polen. De KLM is afhankelijk van de Poolse vliegtuigmaatschappij LOT voor gedeeltes van de vluchten, waar de kwaliteit lager is dan die van KLM. Korte aankondiging over het KickPlus-programma. * 6:40 . Stichting Valk (een samenwerking met de Universiteit Leiden) bied behandelingen aan voor mensen met vliegangst, via bijvoorbeeld een vluchtsimulator met turbulentie. Een deelneemster was stewardess maar vloog 24 jaar niet vanwege vliegangst. * KLM kreeg een prijs voor innovatie in de luchtvaartcatering. * 11:33 . Tineke de Groot over sponsoring van het Van Gogh-jaar vanwege toerisme. KLM-medewerkers krijgen tientallen guldens korting op Van Gogh-catalogi. * Kort nieuws: nieuwe veiligheidvideo's. Aanpassing organisatie: ondernemingsraad brengt advies uit over reorganisatie in drie nieuwe takken: operations, passage en vracht. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Lengte: +- 14 MIN. KLM's kansen in Centraal- en Oost-Europa. Stichting "Valk" individuele behandeling vliegangst, Sponsoring van o.a. Van Gogh tentoonstelling, Zomerdienst. OPMERKINGEN Geluid overstuurd, veel strepen in beeld. Soms wat donker beeld. In de achtergrond van de audiotrack lijkt wat ghosting te zitten van een andere aflevering. Archiefnummer #2
items.title: KLM TV April 1990

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from December 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze twaalfde aflevering is van december 1990. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages Derk Bolt.  Terugblik over het afgelopen jaar (1990). Items in deze aflevering: * Samenwerking. In januari ging KLM samenwerking met British Airways en Sabena. Eerder deed men dit met Northwest Airlines. Een delegatie van dit bedrijf kwam in februari naar het hoofdkantoor in Amstelveen. Ook is er een samenwerking opgezet met ALM (Antilliaanse Luchtvaart Maatschappij). In oktober ging KLM samenwerken met Garuda Indonesië.  * Produkt Jaren '90. Medewerkers geven hun mening over veranderingen bij de KLM in het afgelopen jaar. O.a. over nieuwe werkkleding. Klanten praten positief over verbeteringen in de businessclass.  * Aanpassing Organisatie. De structuur is aangepast naar drie nieuwe divisies (Passenger Sales & Service, Operations en Vracht). Medewerkers geven daar hun mening over. Korte herhaling van de herindeling, inclusief de chefs van die nieuwe divisies. * Teleurstellende Resultaten. Minder winst (340 miljoen gulden) in het boekjaar '89/'90, meer vraag naar vervoer, maar de kosten zijn ook gestegen. In het boekjaar '90/'91 wordt voorspeld dat de winst verder daalt naar 84 miljoen gulden. Korte interviews met directeur-generaal Günter O. Eser van de IATA (International Air Transport Association) over de crisis in de luchtvaartsector.  * President-Directeur Jan de Soet gaat weg bij de KLM, na bijna dertig jaar in dienst te zijn geweest. Lange reportage/film (11m) over zijn carrière, met archiefbeelden van de decennia waarin hij werkzaam was, en de ontwikkeling die de KLM in die tijd maakte. O.a. met beelden van een reclamecampagne voor de Amerikaanse markt. En verder veel promotioneel materiaal over de kwaliteiten van de KLM. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Copyright KLM AMS/DR 1990. Zonder voorafgaande schriftelijke toestemming van KLM mag geen materiaal gekopieerd worden. KLM TV Nederlandse editie. KLM TV is het maandelijks videojournaal voor alle KLM-ers in Nederland. Lengte: +- 15 minuten. Indien u dit wenst kunt u deze band terugsturen naar AMS/DR.  Copyright KLM AMS/DR 1990. Material may not be copied without prior written consent of KLM. KLM TV International edition. KLM TV is the corporate bi-monthly video newsmagazine for the establishments and made for international use only. Length: +- 20 minutes. OPMERKINGEN Nummer in beeld aan het einde van de band: 1889. Geluid overstuurd. Stuk weggevallen rond 1m en ook tegen het einde wat storing. Het Bandenarchief nummer 8
items.title: KLM TV December 1990

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from July 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze zevende aflevering is van julli 1990. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages Derk Bolt.  Items in deze aflevering: * Jaarcijfers KLM van ‘89/’90. Winst na belasting is lager dan in het vorig boekjaar, onder andere door stijging brandstof.  * Reportage over de tankdienst van de KLM. KLM is de enige maatschappij die zelf vliegtuigen mag tanken. Hoe er veilig en goed getankt kan worden. Kerosine gaat in 1992 per pijp in plaats van per boot.  * Onderzoek naar gezondheid van medewerkers. Veel medewerkers werken op onvaste tijden, vandaar dat er een roosteronderzoek wordt gedaan door de Universiteit van Amsterdam naar de psychische en lichamelijke gevolgen voor medewerkers. Medewerkers van KLM vracht doen hier aan mee. * Reportage over souvenirs uit het buitenland, die verboden zijn zoals dieren en planten. Slangenleer en schildpad-schilden, ivoor. Douaneloods in Amsterdam met in beslag genomen souvenirs. Kisten vol slagtanden en olifantpoten als paraplubak. Interview met inspecteur over mogelijke oplossingen voor dit probleem.  * Kort nieuws over Produkt '90. Een nieuwe ontwikkeling is het meet & assist-team voor passagiers met een handicap.  * KLM en ALM (Antiliaanse luchtvaartmaatschappij) hebben een intentieverklaring getekend om meer te gaan  samenwerken. Ook met een Franse luchtvaartmaatschappij (Air Littoral) wordt samenwerking gezocht om op nieuwe bestemmingen te vliegen. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Lengte: +- 14 MIN. KLM TANKDIENST, GEZONDHEIDSKUNDIG ONDERZOEK VRACHT, INVOER VERBODEN PLANTEN, DIEREN EN SOUVENIRS, JAARCIJFERS. OPMERKINGEN Geluid erg overstuurd, veel strepen in beeld. Soms wat donker beeld. Na afsluiting cijfer '1190' in beeld. Het Bandenarchief nummer 5
items.title: KLM TV Juli 1990

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from June 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze aflevering is van juni 1990. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages Derk Bolt. Items in deze aflevering: * 70 jaar KLM in de VK. Het is 70 jaar geleden dat de KLM in het VK actief is. Korte terugblik op hoe het allemaal begon, maar ook wat er nu aan het veranderen is. Manchester is de tweede zakenstad van het VK. Verkoopleider voor UK Noord & Noord-Ierland wordt geïnterviewd. De KLM probeert Schiphol als overstaplocatie aan te bieden in plaats van London voor passagiers vanuit Manchester. Ook voor vrachtaanbod is dat interessant. * Verjaardag 747-400. Het is een jaar geleden dat de eerste 747-400 (op 19 mei 1989) de lucht inging. Er zijn nog enige issues, er zijn 120 aanpassingen geweest (vooral voor comfort en werkomstandigheden). 20% van de vluchten met de 747-400 zijn vanwege technische problemen vertraagd. * 'Schiphol 2000', reportage over de uitbreiding van de luchthaven. De nieuwe verkeerstoren is in ruwbouw af en er komen grotere vertrekhallen. * Aanpassing parkeergelegenheid. Sommige medewerkers moeten op andere plekken parkeren. * Nieuwe luchtlijn: vanaf 22 juni 1990 vliegt KLM naar Baltimore/Washington, de 145ste bestemming . Tweede ticket naar deze bestemming is tijdelijk gratis. * Sport: korte samenvattingen van alle WK-wedstrijden worden vertoond op intercontinentale vluchten, ook tenniswedstrijden. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Lengte +- 14 MIN. PORTRET KLM ORGANISATIE IN ENGELAND, B747-400 1 JAAR IN DE VLOOT, KLM TANKDIENST, UITBREIDINGEN OP SCHIPHOL-C. OPMERKINGEN Geluid overstuurd, veel strepen in beeld. Soms wat donker beeld. Het Bandenarchief nummer 4
items.title: KLM TV Juni 1990

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from November 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze elfde aflevering is van november 1990. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages Derk Bolt.  Items in deze aflevering: * De bezuinigingsmaatregelen van de KLM. Er is een crisis in de luchtvaart en daarom moet er bezuinigd worden. Kosten moeten 400 miljoen gulden naar beneden, 500 banen moeten verdwijnen en productiviteit moet 7% per jaar omhoog voor de komende drie jaar. Medewerkers vertellen wat zij er van vinden. Ook bij het NOS Journaal was dit een item. Werkverdeling en roosters moeten evenwichtiger en flexibeler, ook moeten taken worden afgestoten. Interview met hoger management en voorzitter ondernemingsraad.  * Nieuwe zuiveringsinstallatie op Schiphol Oost wordt binnenkort geopend als het KLM MIlieu Centrum. Hier wordt vies water met chemische processen gereinigd. Wat er moet gebeuren met het resterende afvalslib is onduidelijk, mogelijk wordt het gedumpt op de tweede Maasvlakte of verbrand.  * Produkt jaren'90. Een KLM delegatie is naar Australië vertrokken om te kijken of het eten wat hier op de business class wordt geserveerd wel naar behoren is. Vertoond bij een ontbijtshow op 'Kanaal 11'.  * Flight Tracking. Test voor een nieuw systeem over het verloop van de vlucht, dus waar de vlucht zich bevindt via de schermen in het vliegtuig. * Winterdienst '90-'91. Wijzigingen t.o.v. van de zomerdienstregeling. Enkele bestemmingen zijn geschrapt, zoals Palma, Malta, Izmir en Ankara vanwege beperkte interesse. Turijn is er bijgekomen.  OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Lengte: +- 15 MIN. Interviews Hr. Den Hartog en Hr. Kuin over bezuinigingsplannen, opening KLM Milieucentrum, Produkt '90 info, Nieuwe bestemming Turijn OPMERKINGEN Nummer in beeld aan het einde van de band: 1656. Geluid overstuurd, strepen in beeld. Donker beeld. Vreemde lijn onderin beeld. Het Bandenarchief nummer 7
items.title: KLM TV November 1990

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This tape contains two separate shows. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. OMSCHRIJVING Band van KLM-TV met een tweetal losse films, dit is dus geen reguliere KLM-TV aflevering. ITEM 1: “Samen maken wij het verschil” (15m) Wervende reclamefilm over hoe de KLM de strijd aangaat met een fictieve maatschappij onder de naam “Grey Airlines”. Het begint met een getekende animatie over het deze matige, saaie vliegtuigmaatschappij. Vervolgens gaat het over de voordelen van KLM, zoals betere service, de jonge vloot, samenwerking met andere vliegtuigmaatschappijen en focus op de kerntaken. Ook worden beelden getoond over hoe maaltijden worden bereid bij KLM catering en het personeel wordt getraind over het nieuwe servies. Entertainment, zoals muziek en films aan boord. Ook persoonlijke verzorging, zoals kussentjes en slaapmaskers. Nieuwe stoelen, etc.  ITEM 2: “70 jaar KLM”, Een geschiedenis van de toekomst (23m) Documentairefilm van Hans Keller en Maud Keus (“Alleen op de wereld producties”) die een impressie geeft van het verleden en toekomst van de KLM. De vorm is een combinatie van historisch archiefmateriaal met recent materiaal, ondersteund door muziek en soms gesproken woord.  De film opent met een piloot die naar zijn werk gaat. Vervolgens historische zwart/wit archiefbeelden uit het verleden van KLM gecombineerd met modern opgenomen sfeershots op Schiphol en bestemmingen waar de KLM op vliegt (New York, Indonesië). Er wordt telkens een verbinding gezocht tussen het archiefmateriaal en de moderne tijd, d.w.z. archiefbeelden van maaltijden worden gecombineerd met recente shots van KLM catering. Camera: Paul van den Bos. Geluid: George Bossaers. Beeld research: Herman de Wit. Muziek: Henny Vrienten. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING SPECIALE AFLEVERING Maand/Jaar: APRIL 1990 Lengte: NR. 1 +/- 16 MIN.. NR.2 +/ 23 MIN. Onderwerpen: nr. 1 “Samen maken wij het Verschil” KLM werkt aan Produkt Jaren Negentig. nr. 2 “70 jaar KLM” een geschiedenis van de toekomst. OPMERKINGEN Nummer in beeld op het einde: 1057, gevolgd door pieptoon. Geluid overstuurd, strepen in beeld. Donker beeld. 'Ghosting' van andere audiotrack. Het Bandenarchief nummer 11
items.title: KLM TV - "Samen maken wij het verschil" en 70 jaar KLM: een geschiedenis van de toekomst

items.description: Episode of KLM TV, a series of informative business television programs released on VHS, made for employees of Dutch airline KLM. This episode is from September 1990. The rest of this description follows in Dutch: Aflevering van KLM TV, een serie informatieve programma's uitgebracht op VHS, bestemd voor KLM medewerkers. Deze negende aflevering is van september 1990. OMSCHRIJVING Presentatie: Mark Blaisse. Reportages: Derk Bolt.  Items in deze aflevering: * Kwartaalcijfers KLM.  De nieuwe kwartaalcijfers van KLM zijn niet rooskleurig. Er is een  grote winstval, onder andere door spanningen in het Midden-Oosten. President Direkteur [sic] Mr. J.F.A. de Soet geeft in het programma een toespraak over deze problematiek. Resultaat is dat er bezuinigd moet worden, want de kosten moeten 300-400 miljoen gulden lager. Het aannemen van nieuw personeel moet tot het uiterste worden beperkt, en de Soet hint ook op (gedwongen) ontslagen. * Fokker 50. NLM en Netherlines gaan samen tot KLM Cityhopper. Er worden een tiental nieuwe vliegtuigen van het type Fokker 50 geleverd. De overdracht ging gepaard met feestelijke activiteiten.  * Milieu. De KLM probeert milieuvriendelijker te worden. Dit gebeurd bijvoorbeeld met de bouw van een nieuw milieu-centrum voor de verwerking van giftige materialen. Maar er zijn meer initiatieven, zoals dat catering beter afval gaat scheiden. Er worden 5 miljoen plastic bekertjes worden per jaar weggegooid. Dit kan beter worden gerecycled met de zogenaamde Cupido-vuilnisbakken (cup in doos) voor recycling. Er volgen nog enkele andere voorbeelden. * KLM / PDS (Publication Distribution Service). PDS, een dochter van KLM,  distribueert specialistische tijdschriften (voornamelijk internationaal) en maakt gebruik van KLM vracht van deze dienst. * Produkt '90. Nieuwe ontwikkelingen van dit programma: er komen overdekte vervoerstrappen. Verder werd op 25 augustus de radardome geplaatst op de nieuwe verkeerstoren, die 100 meter hoog is. OORSPRONKELIJKE BESCHRIJVING Lengte: +- 14 MIN. Overdracht Fokker 50 aan NLM/Netherlines, Milieu in de werkomgeving, Publication Distribution Services, Produkt '90 info. OPMERKINGEN Hoes bevat enquêtekaartje met vragen over wat de kijker vindt van deze aflevering. Audiotrack lijkt 'ghosting' te hebben met audiotrack gebabbel? Na afsluiting cijfer '1268' in beeld. Geluid overstuurd, veel strepen in beeld. Soms wat donker beeld. Het Bandenarchief nummer 6

items.description: The 1990 meeting of the Kings Mountain Baptist Association met at Pleasant Grover Baptist Church and Elizabeth Baptist Church in Shelby, NC. The minutes are dedicated to the late Rev. Wilson Padgett and Rev. William Valentine Tarlton. Dr. Chris White, president of Gardner-Webb College, reports that Gardner-Webb has the largest number of ministerial students out of all Baptist colleges in North Carolina. Christopher Road Baptist Church was brought into full membership of the Association. The Strategy Planning Objectives were approved, including various retreats, evangelism in predominately Black communities, and educational opportunities for laity. The Bob Davis Endowment Fund was established by the Executive Board.
items.title: 1990 Minutes of the Kings Mountain Baptist Association

items.description: Кирило-Мефодіївське товариство. – Т. 1: Джерела з історії суспільно-політичного руху на Україні ХІХ – початку ХХ ст. / Упорядн І. І. Глизь (гол. упорядн.), М. І. Бутич, О. О. Франко. АН Української РСР. Археографічна комісія; Інститут історії; Центральний державний історичний архів у м. Києві. – К., 1990. – 544 с. Анотація: У виданні вперше якнайповніше зібрано документи і матеріали з історії Кирило-Мефодіївського товариства, діяльність якого була важливим етапом визвольного руху слов’янських народів. До першого тому включено загальні матеріали слідства, слідчі справи М. І. Гулака, М. І. Костомарова, В. М. Білозерського. Для істориків, філософів, літературознавців, викладачів і студентів вузів, всіх, хто цікавиться історією українського та інших слов’янських народів Зміст: Передмова …  5 Від упорядників …  16 Частина перша. Загальні матеріали слідства …  19 Частина друга. Справа М. І. Гулака …  89 Частина третя. Справа М. І. Костомарова …  241 Частина четверта. Справа В. М. Білозерського …  367 Додатки …  467 Примітки …  468 Іменний покажчик … 505 Географічний покажчик …  514 Хронологічний перелік документів …  518

items.subject: MS-DOS
items.description: Knights of the Sky  is a World War I flight combat sim where you pilot one of 20 different aircraft (each handles differently) as you engage in simple missions or join a full campaign where you will progress through World War I, going on a variety of missions, patrols, and even encounter enemy aces. You can engage balloons and blimps, enemy fighters and bombers, even strafe group targets such as supply trains. If you do really good in the game, one of the enemy aces may drop a note to challenge you to an aerial duel. A unique feature of the game is the capability of modem link so you can challenge fellow modem owners to dogfights, something that none of its contemporaries had.

items.description: A soundtrack of incidental music for the anime Kyattou Ninden Teyandee that I was sent back in the early 2000s, which does not seem to exist. There are two albums listed in both the English and Japanese Wikipedia and on vgmdb.com, ( キャッ党忍伝てやんでえ 猫座第一回公演 and キャッ党忍伝てやんでえ 猫座千秋楽公演) and it is neither of those. From the numbering scheme, it's likely that at least 6 tracks are missing. Probably composed by Kawai Kenji (川井憲次) with a release date of 1990. 128kbps/44100kHz MP3 files, which isn't ideal, but was standard for the time.

items.description: Leopold II wordt geboren als tweede zoon van de Leopold I en Louise-Marie van Orléans. Omdat zijn oudere broer, Lodewijk Filips, op jonge leeftijd sterft volgt Leopold zijn vader op als koning als deze in 1865 overlijdt. Als Leopold vijftien jaar is, overlijdt zijn moeder. Drie jaar later trouwt hij met Maria-Henriëtta van Habsburg-Lorreinen, de aartshertogin van Oostenrijk. Ze krijgen vier kinderen: Louise-Marie, Leopold, Stéphanie en Clémentine.
items.title: Koning Leopold II het Belgische Koningshuis

items.description: Het regnum van Koning Leopold II werd door een belangrijk feit gekenmerkt: op 14 december 1909 – 72 uren vóór zijn dood – tekende de Koning de wet op de algemene en verplichte militaire dienstplicht. Zo werd het oneerlijke stelsel waardoor soldaten uitgeloot werden en dat de rijken toeliet hun dienstplicht aan de armen of armsten te verkopen afgeschaft. Dit systeem zou nog 82 jaar in voege blijven. De gebeurtenissen van augustus 1914, toen ons land, hoewel het strikt neutraal was gebleven, door Duitsland binnengevallen werd, toonden de wijsheid van die nieuwe militaire politiek aan.
items.title: Koning Leopold II en de Militaire Dienstplicht

items.description: In het jonge België, dat op velerlei terrein energie ontplooide, aanvankelijk veel meer dan Noord-Nederland, was het Nederlands voorlopig vrijwel overal uit het openbaar bestuur verdwenen. Het was er alles Frans wat de klok sloeg. Toch kende de nieuwe koning, een geboren Duitser, de taal van zijn Vlaamse onderdanen, maar hij sprak het Nederlands nauwelijks. In 1856, toen hij een kwarteeuw koning was, beloofde Leopold ‘ce bon vieux flamand’ te zullen handhaven. Toen zijn oudste zoon, de hertog van Brabant en latere koning Leopold II, twaalf jaar geworden was, begeerde de koning, dat zowel deze als diens broer, de graaf van Vlaanderen, ‘onder eenen schrijver, wiens werken zoo veel bijval verkregen hebben, de studie eener taal’ zouden voortzetten, ‘die door eene groote meerderheid hunner landgenoten wordt gesproken’. Daarom benoemde Leopold I niemand minder dan Hendrik Conscience, die toen griffier was bij de Koninklijke Academie van Schoone Kunsten te Antwerpen, tot hun ‘leeraar in de Vlaamsche taal en letterkunde’; maar mede tengevolge van de partijpolitiek, waarin de latere ‘patriarch der Vlaamse letterkunde’ was betrokken, is dit koninklijk besluit nooit uitgevoerd. Leopold II betuigde als koning herhaal-delijk zijn sympathie voor het Nederlands, maar het duurde heel lang eer hij naliet Frans te spreken, ook tot de leiders der Nederlandse congressen of tot de leden der Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie. Toen hij als hertog van Brabant met Maria Hendrika, aartshertogin van Oostenrijk, huwde, prijkte in Gent, boven een verlichte gevel, het uitbundig toegejuichte versje, dat misschien gemaakt was door Prudens van Duyse: ‘Ik ontsteke twintig keerskens meer of min Voor den Hertog en de Hertogin: Maar ik zal er wel duizend ontsteken, Als Uw kindeken Vlaemsch zal spreken’. De zoon van Leopold II is evenwel heel jong gestorven. Troonopvolger was weldra de zoon van zijn broeder Philips, graaf van Vlaanderen, gehuwd met Prinses Maria van Hohenzollem-Sigmaringen. Toen deze jonge kroonprins Boudewijn in 1886 in het openbare leven zou treden, waren de Vlamingen bang, dat ook dit derde geslacht hunner koningen praktisch Vlaamsonkundig zou blijken. Daarom verzocht het Willems-Fonds, dat toen geleid werd door Julius Vuylsteke, aan prins Boudewijn om in het openbaar Nederlands te spreken, onder het klemmend betoog: ‘Evenals in Oostenrijk, waar zoovele volken elk hunne eigene taal spreken en liefhebben, de vorsten van het Keizerlijk Huis, zoo nauw aan het Uwe verwant, het zich tot plicht rekenen die verschillende talen aan te leeren, evenzoo zal Uwe Hoogheid, geboren in de hoofdstad van het aloude Brabant, getuige van den prijs, waarop de Vlaamsche bevolking getoond heeft hare taal te stellen, zich gedrongen hebben gevoeld die taal machtig te worden, zoowel als die van de andere helft der Belgen’. Inderdaad kende Boudewijn Nederlands; evenals zijn uit Oostenrijk afkomstige tante, die evenwel na haar komst in Brussel het dapper aangeleerde Nederlands moest verzaken, doordat de hof kringen dit uitscholden voor een ‘patois flamand’, totdat zij het jaren later, na het tot kracht komen der Vlaamse Beweging, op gevorderde leeftijd opnieuw ging aanleren. In 1887 werd op de Grote Markt te Brugge het standbeeld onthuld van de helden van de Guldensporenslag te Kortrijk in 1302: Pieter de Conine en Jan Breidel, die beroemd geworden waren door Consciences Leeuw van Vlaanderen. Dit werd een daverend Vlaams volksfeest. Enkele weken later kwam Leopold II er de helden van 1302 eren met een rede in het Frans, die zeer veel weerklank vond bij de Vlamingen, toen men vernam, dat hij d,eze toespraak in het Nederlands had willen uitspreken, doch dit op aandrang van de franskiljonse burgemeester had nagelaten. Maar de volgende dag kwam de jonge kroonprins Boudewijn te Brugge en sprak er uren lang uitstekend Nederlands, wat het volk in laaiende geestdrift deed juichen: ‘wij hebben eenen Vlaamschen Prins!’ In datzelfde jaar kwamen koning en koningin op uitnodiging van de burgemeester van Brussel, Karel Buls, de eerste voorstelling in de vernieuwde Vlaamse schouwburg bijwonen, waarbij de koning in een Nederlandse rede o.a. verklaarde: ‘Indien de kennis der vreemde talen ten onzen tijde bijzonder nuttig is, is die der nationale talen eene noodzakelijkheid. Het is noodig ze aan de jeugd gelijktijdig te doen aanleeren en het is te wenschen, dat het gebruik er van aan alle Belgen meer en meer gemeen worde’. Hierop volgden daverende toejuichingen, zelfs van ‘Leve onze Vlaamsche Koning!’
items.title: Koning Leopold II en de Vlaamse Beweging

items.description: Game for the Sharp X68000. 【【【【【　こらこら　】】】】】 ◎ゲームの内容 　基本的に某ゲーセンのパズルーゲームと同様です。 　画面の上から落下してくる３つブロックをユーザーが誘導して同色のものを縦横斜に３つ以上に並ばせるとそのブロックが消滅し得点とになるゲームです。 　誘導はテンキーの［４］で左、［６］で右に動き、［スペース］バーで３つのブロックをローテーション（回す）します。 　３つ１組のブロックが地面または他のブロックに乗っかると次の１組が又現われます。こうして、詰み上げられたブロックがゲーム画面中央上のブロック出現ゾーンのエリアまで行ってしまうとゲームオーバーです。 　１ラインを消す毎に画面右の絵を隠している同色のブロックも消えます。１ラインは 同色のブロックが縦横斜に３つ並んだ時の単位です。４つ、５つ....のブロックが並んだ場合には２、３....ライン並んだと数えられます。 　ブロックを１つ消す毎に画面右上のメーター（棒グラフ状のもの）が右に１ドットずつ増えて行きいっぱいになるとその面はクリアーで、画面右の消したブロックの部分の絵を見ることが出来ます。 　すなわち、面クリア条件の一定の量のブロックを消す間にどれだけたくさんのライン単位数を各色均一に消せるかが絵をまるまる見ることができるかのポイントです。 　又、絵を隠しているブロックを面クリアまでに全部消すとパーフェクトボーナス１００００００００点が入ります。 　このゲームは、地、天、水、火、海、闇のステージの全６面あります。 　面が進むにつれてゲームスピードも速くなって行きます。 　全ステージをクリアーするとエンディングの絵が見れます。又、稼いだ得点が５００００００００点以上の場合にはエンディングの絵が変ります。 ◎得点及び特殊ブロックの説明 通常得点 　画面上に３つのブロックが出現の度に　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１０点 　１ライン消すと　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１０００点 　２　　〃　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　２０００点 　３　　〃　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　４０００点 　４　　〃　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　８０００点 　ｎ　　〃　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　２＾（ｎ−１）＊１０００点 　面クリアーのとき絵を隠していたブロック１つにつき　　　　　　１０００点 　面クリアーのパーフェクトボーナス　　　　　　　　　１００００００００点 特殊ブロックを消すと以下の得点と効果が発生します。 　スピード↑　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１００点 　　　　　　　ゲームスピードが少し速くなります。 　スピード↓　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１００点 　　　　　　　ゲームスピードが少し遅くなります。 　ハンマー　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　３００点 　　　　　　　画面右の絵を隠しているブロックが１つ余分に減ります。 　ハンマー＊２　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　６００点 　　　　　　　画面右の絵を隠しているブロックが２つ余分に消えます。 　イナズマ　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１０００点 　　　　　　　画面上の同色のすべてのブロックが消えます。 　ファイヤー　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　８００点 　　　　　　　炎がゲームの邪魔をします。 　２倍　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　５００点 　　　　　　　ライン消去得点が２倍になります。 　たこ　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　１５００点 　　　　　　　スミをはいてゲームの邪魔をします。 ( Full text of the readme here )

Поезії, драми, оповідання До першого тому ввійшли поезії різних років життя, поетичні переклади, історичні драми «Сава Чалий», «Переяславська ніч», «Елліни Тавріди» та ін., а також соціально-психологічні оповідання. Том 2. Повісті До тому ввійшли історичні повісті, написані російською мовою, в яких відображено побут, звичаї, трагічні події XVI — XVIII ст. — «Сын», «Кудеяр», «Сорок лет», «Холуй», «Черниговка».

items.description: This two-volume book was written for students of technical colleges who have had the usual mathematical training. It contains just enough in­ formation to continue with a wide variety of engineering disciplines. It covers analytic geometry and linear algebra, differential and integral cal­ culus for functions of one and more variables, vector analysis, numerical and functional series (including Fourier series), ordinary differential equa­ tions, functions of a complex variable, Laplace and Fourier transforms, and equations of mathematical physics. This list itself demonstrates that the book covers the material for both a basic course in higher mathematics and several specialist sections that are important for applied problems. Hence, it may be used by a wide range of readers. Besides students in techni­ cal colleges and those starting a mathematics course, it may be found useful by engineers and scientists who wish to refresh their knowledge of some aspects of mathematics. We tried to give the fundamental material concisely and without dis­ tracting detail. We concentrated on the presentation of the basic ideas of linear algebra and analysis to make it detailed and as comprehensible as possible. Mastery of these ideas is a requirement to understand the later material. The many examples also serve this aim. The examples were written to help students with the mechanics of solving typical problems. More than 600 diagrams are simple illustrations, clear enough to demonstrate the ideas and statements convincingly, and can be fairly easily reproduced. We were conscious not to burden the course with scrupulous proofs for theorems which have little practical application. As a rule we chose the proof (marked in the text with special symbols) that was constructive in nature or explained fundamental ideas that had been introduced, show­ ing how they work. This approach made it possible to devise algorithms for solving whole classes of important problems. In addition to the examples, we have included several carefully selected problems and exercises (around 1000) which should be of interest to those pursuing an independent mathematics course. The problems have the form of moderately sized theorems. They are very simple but are good training for those learning the fundamental ideas.
items.title: Mathematical Analysis For Engineers Vol 1

items.description: Сост. П. Г. Горелов. — Москва: Молодая гвардия, 1990. — 254,[2] с.; — ISBN 5-235-01503-7 Роман Борисович Гуль (1896, Пенза — 1986, Нью-Йорк) — автор «Ледяного похода», повестей «В рассеяньи сущие», «Жизнь на фукса», «Белые по Черному», романов «Генерал БО», «Скиф», «Дзержинский», «Конь рыжий», мемуаров «Я унес Россию», книг литературной критики «Одвуконь», «Одвуконь два»; с 1966-го до кончины главный редактор «Нового журнала» в Нью-Йорке. Книга «Красные маршалы», объективно и глубоко художественно показывая события гражданской войны через портреты ее отдельных вождей — Тухачевского, Ворошилова, Буденного, Блюхера, Котовского,— не только восполняет недостающие страницы русской истории, но и возвращает России имя замечательного писателя. Содержание Моя биография Тухачевский Предисловие Лейб-гвардии поручик В боях мировой войны  Пять побегов из плена  Тухачевский в Петрограде  Муравьев и Тухачевский  Бои за Симбирск Советская Марна Разгром Сибири  Ставрогин  Даешь Европу!  Восстанье Кронштадта Подавитель крестьян Послесловие Ворошилов Предисловие Из ворот Кремля «Володька» Октябрь Вождь партизанов «Красный Верден» Борьба с Троцким Буденный Разгром Ростова В тысячеверстный поход на Европу Штурм «бастиона Европы»  Первый маршал Блюхер Полководец под псевдонимом  Блюхер появляется Борьба с Дутовым Штурм Перекопа  Борьба у ворот Монголии  «Рычи. Китай!» Московский заговор Котовский Бессарабский Карл Мор Тюрьмы, нерчинская каторга, смертный приговор  Кандалы с аукциона Кавалерист  Атака на Польшу Котовский и Матюхин Смерть Котовского
items.title: Красные маршалы: Тухачевский, Ворошилов, Блюхер, Котовский
